data.actual_result: The message timestamp shows like `gestern um 08:48 Uhr`, the embed timestamp shows like `Mo. Okt. 30., 2017 at 05:20 PM`. This means the format is mixed german / english. Weekday and month are in german, the "at" is in english, the time format is 12-hour format, not 24-hour format, ...
data.expected_result: Embed timestamp is formatted the same as message timestamp
data.short_description: Timestamps in Embeds are formatted inconsistently
data.steps_to_repro: - receive a message with an embed with a timestamp - look at the embed in the Web UI
